message.body: Hey mad! Do you wanna be in our Pollyanna? I told Chelsea to ask you, not sure if she remembered lol
Okay.. Now I need some info. What's your favorite color, favorite restaurant/food, favorite store, and hobbies? I'll fill the slip out for you
OMG! I never responded to you last night!!! I'm sorry!!! I don't really have a favorite color, I like outback I guess and I love ulta. But if it's too late,
it's no biggie. I like anything!
Lol it's not too late! I'm at work now so I'll fill it out.
